Content: While being damaged, increase self ATK by 3% and DEF by 6% for 10s. This buff can be stacked up to 3.
A smith technique before the Lament is used, giving the blade a relatively light usability with its cumbersome-looking body. Buzzing sounds can be heard when slashing, like a croon from eternity.
After using Resonance Liberation, increase normal attack and heavy attack DMG by 19.2% for 10s.
A sword of recognized blessing since it accompanies multiple fighters' triumphs. So, may victory be with you.
After using Resonance Liberation, increase ATK by 18% for 12s.
A gun known for its strong firepower. Impassioned convictions will rise when this gun is held on the battlefield.
After using Resonance Skill, heavy attack will ignore 38% of target DEF for 8s.
A pair of sound gauntlets with a brutal weight and ultimate reliability. It can unleash huge power enough to move mountains in the hands of proficient users.
After triggering Concerto Effect, increase Resonance Liberation DMG by 9.6% for 10s. This effect can be stacked up 2 times.
An arm inspired by floating lamps in dramas. Carrying relatively advanced matrix chain technology, it shall make perfect operations masterpieces worthy of appreciation.
